attributes.action: Restict Access to Consumers White Data By the Debt Purchase Industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Debt Purchase Industry, want to have access to Consumers Personal data, before they purchase a debt from a financial institution. Legislation should be introduced to strenghten Consumers rights for privacy and to prevent the Debt Purchase Industry accessing this data.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Restict Access to Consumers White Data By the Debt Purchase Industry."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14750.asp

Prime Minister's Office
